explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of recurrent neural networks (RNNs) as a language model, which is a subset of machine learning.

explanations.deep learning: RNNs are a type of deep learning model, and the paper focuses on improving their performance.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper investigates the performance of RNNs in language modeling tasks.
explanations.RNN: The abbreviation RNN is used throughout the paper to refer to recurrent neural networks.
explanations.language model: The paper discusses RNNs as a powerful language model (LM) and investigates their performance in this context.
explanations.LM: The abbreviation LM is used to refer to language models in the paper.
